services.description: As an IT Staff, I am responsible for ensuring that all information technology systems and network infrastructure within the company operate effectively and efficiently. My scope of work includes maintaining hardware and software, managing computer networks, and providing technical support to all employees. In terms of network management, I handle the configuration and administration of MikroTik devices for routing, firewall, bandwidth allocation, and internet connectivity. I regularly monitor network performance and perform troubleshooting in the event of connectivity issues. I am also responsible for managing Windows Server, including Active Directory, file sharing, user management, and access rights configuration according to the needs of each department. Additionally, I ensure the server systems run smoothly, perform updates, and conduct regular data backups to prevent data loss. As part of the companyâ€™s security system, I maintain the CCTV system, including installation, routine inspections of devices such as DVR/NVR and cameras, as well as monitoring connectivity and video storage. Beyond technical tasks, I conduct IT asset inventory and documentation, provide basic training on device and software usage to users, and coordinate with other departments to meet their information technology needs. Through this role, I am committed to supporting the smooth operation of the company by delivering reliable and integrated technology solutions.
